summary: Implements the taker side of a CoinJoin protocol, handling maker selection, UTXO filtering, transaction assembly, signing, broadcasting, and callback management, with support for fidelity bond calculations and podle commitments.
business_intent: Enable users to participate in privacy‑preserving Bitcoin CoinJoin mixes by coordinating with makers to create and broadcast joint transactions while managing fees, fidelity bonds, and post‑mix callbacks.
